message.body: Hi! I'm meeting some people at the Space1026 art auction that starts at 7 if you want to join too!? It's free I think! Unless you end up falling in love w an art piece :)
It's somewhat near you too- 10th and Arch St.
(1/2) Thanks! I appreciate the invite. I am at the dentist right now though! I am going to try to get to a show closing tonight or at least see it tomorrow for
(2/2) the last day. It's at Paradigm Gallery on 4th.
But I really appreciate the invite. I want to connect soon and discuss sculpture stuff.
Yes, definitely! I will see you soon.
